title: Most popular product brands on Facebook 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 10 number of Platforms.
The Facebook fans in millions is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
There is a difference of 159.62 between the maximum Platform Facebook and minimum Platform KFC.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Facebook fans in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 10 number of Platforms.
The Facebook fans in millions is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
There is a difference of 159.62 between the maximum Platform Facebook and minimum Platform KFC.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Facebook fans in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
Second maximum Facebook fans in millions is found at Platform Samsung.
The highest Platform Facebook has 159.62 more Facebook fans in millions than the lowest Platform KFC.
Facebook fans in millions at Platform Facebook is 214.62 , second place is Samsung at 160.05, and thirdly is Coca-Cola at 107.11.
The highest value 214.62 at Facebook is almost 2.23 times larger than the average value 96.24.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 962.41.
